name: Dead Loss Despair
description:
This game was a submission for the TiPS Spring Game Jam. We had a lot of fun developing this and it's easily our most ambitious jam project so far. We hope you have fun playing it! :)

You play as an astronaut who loses track of their spaceship very easily. It's your job to relocate the spaceship before you run out of oxygen or kill yourself in some other way.

Move with WASD or arrow keys.

Credits:

Programming & Art: Troglodev

Soundtrack & SFX: Esnix

Made with Godot, with love.
